agent_card.name: Mathematics
agent_card.description: An agent that independently searches and integrates information to answer academic questions in the field of mathematics. It provides logical, structured answers and can collaborate with other academic agents if needed. If the question is outside mathematics, it will inform the user.

skills.name: Answer Mathematics Questions
skills.description: Answers academic questions in mathematics by searching and integrating relevant information. If the question is outside mathematics, the agent will inform the user.
examples: Explain the concept of group theory in mathematics.
